            Learn more about UCR's mass notification systems     ENS Information Previous Next 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The UCR Office of Emergency Management (OEM) collaborates with campus units and a network of local, state, and federal entities to facilitate the effective mobilization of resources. We strive to be '  event-ready'   by taking a proactive '  all-hazards'   approach to  P revent,  M itigate,  P repare,  R espond, and  R ecover from adverse events or disruptions. OEM works in conjunction with Mission Continuity Planning, a UC systemwide program that enables all of our campuses, medical centers, and national laboratory to meet the challenges of resuming business operations after a significant event occurs.
